Verses: 1  ippadiyaaga, Endha Manushanum Engalaik Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaararendrum, Dhevanudaiya Ragasiyangalin Ukkiraanakkaararendrum Ennikkollakkadavan.
2  melum, Ukkiraanakkaaran Unmaiyullavanendru Kaanappaduvadhu Avanukku Avasiyamaam.

3  aayinum Naan Ungalaaleyaavadhu Manusharudaiya Niyaayanaalin Visaaranaiyinaaleyaavadhu Theerppaipperuvadhu Enakku Migavum Arpa Kaariyamaayirukkiradhu; Naanum Ennaikkuriththuth Theerppuchchollugiradhillai.
4  ennidaththil Naan Yaadhoru Kutraththaiyum Ariyen; Aagilum Adhinaale Naan Neethimaanaagirathillai; Ennai Niyaayam Visaarikkiravar Karththare.

5  aanadhaal, Karththar Varumalavum Neengal Kaalaththukkumunne Yaadhondraikkuriththum Theerppuchchollaadhirungal, Irulil Maraindhirukkiravaigalai Avar Veliyarangamaakki, Irudhayangalin Yosanaigalaiyum Velippaduththuvaar; Appozhudhu Avanavanukkuriya Pugazhchchi Dhevanaal Undaagum.

6  sagodharare, Ezhudhappattadharku Minji Ennavendaamendru Neengal Engalaale Katrukkollavum, Oruvanum Oruvanimiththam Matroruvanukku Virodhamaai Irumaappadaiyaadhirukkavum, Naan Ungalnimiththam Ennaiyum Appollovaiyum Thirushtaandhamaaga Vaiththu, Ivaigalai Ezhudhinen.
7  andriyum Unnai Viseshiththavanaagumpadi Seygiravar Yaar? Unakku Undaayirukkiravaigalil Nee Petrukkollaadhadhu Yaadhu? Nee Petrukkondavanaanaal Petrukkollaadhavanpol En Menmaipaaraattugiraai?

8  ippozhudhu Thirupthiyadaindhirukkireergale, Ippozhudhu Aisuvariyavaangalaayirukkireergale, Engalaiyallaamal Aalugireergale; Neengal Aalugiravargalaanaal Nalamaayirukkum; Appozhudhu Ungaludanekooda Naangalum Aaluvome.

9  engalukkuth Thondrugirapadi Dhevan Apposthalargalaagiya Engalai Maranaththukkuk Kurikkappattavargalpolak Kadaisiyaanavargalaaik Kaanappadappanninaar; Naangal Ulagaththukkum Thoodharukkum Manusharukkum Vedikkaiyaanom.
10  naangal Kiristhuvinimiththam Paiththiyakkaarar, Neengal Kiristhuvil Puththisaaligal; Naangal Balaveenar, Neengal Balavaangal; Neengal Ganavaangal, Naangal Ganaveenar.
11  inneramvaraikkum Pasiyullavargalum, Thaagamullavargalum, Nirvaanigalum, Kuttundavargalum, Thanga Idamillaadhavargalumaayirukkirom.
12  engal Kaigalinaale Velaiseydhu, Paadupadugirom; Vaiyappattu, Aaseervadhikkirom; Thunbappattu, Sagikkirom.
13  dhooshikkappattu, Vendikkollugirom; Innaalvaraikkum Ulagaththin Kuppaiyaippolavum, Ellaarum Thudaiththuppodugira Azhukkaippolavumaanom.
14  ungalai Vetkappaduththumpadikku Naan Ivaigalai Ezhudhavillai, Neengal Enakkup Piriyamaana Pillaigalendru Ungalukkup Puththisollugiren.
15  kiristhuvukkul Padhinaayiram Ubaaththiyaayargal Ungalukku Irundhaalum, Thagappanmaar Anegar Ungalukku Illaiye; Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Suviseshaththil Naan Ungalaip Petren.
16  aagaiyaal, Ennaip Pinpatrugiravargalaagungalendru Ungalukkup Puththisollugiren.

17  idhinimiththamaaga, Enakkup Piriyamum, Karththarukkul Unmaiyumulla En Kumaaranaagiya Theemoththeyuvai Ungalidaththil Anuppinen; Naan Engum Endhach Sabaiyilum Podhiththuvarugirapirakaaram Kiristhuvukkullaana En Nadakkaigalai Avan Ungalukku Gnaapagappaduththuvaan.
18  naan Ungalidaththirku Varugiradhillai Engiradhaaga Silar Irumaappadaindhirukkiraargal.
19  aagilum Karththarukku Siththamaanaal Naan Seekkiramaai Ungalidaththirku Vandhu, Irumaappadaindhirukkiravargaludaiya Pechchaiyalla, Avargaludaiya Belaththaiye Arindhukolven.
20  dhevanudaiya Raajyam Pechchile Alla, Belaththile Undaayirukkiradhu.
21  ungalukku Ennavendum? Naan Pirampodu Ungalidaththil Varavendumo? Alladhu Anbodum Saandhamulla Aaviyodum Varavendumo?
